The proposal is driven by the digital by default and privacy by default principles. It alignswith flagship Commission initiatives such as the AI act, Data Governance Act, GDPR andEUDPR. It provides for user-centric processes ready for automation, enabling all operationalexchanges with customs to be carried out electronically through a single multipurpose EUinterface. It supports the once-only principle
